title: Sanofi Pasteur logo
content:
Hi everyone,

I need to design an invitation for sanofi pasteur, however, the people that are handling this stuff here are unable to tell me what typefaces are provided in the logo.  
Can anyone id them for me ?

Thanks in advance

Cheers,  
Andrei

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sanofipasteur\_en.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905052623/http:/typophile.com/files/sanofipasteur_en.gif) | 2.13 KB |

 [‹ (x) Black Rose old printer font - Venice {Stephen, Raph}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905052623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29451 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Black Rebel Motorcycle Club "Howl" album cover type - Giza {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905052623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29438 "Go to next forum topic")
author: andrei_bva

comments.content:
This looks like a mixture of Verdana vor the ’s’ and the ’e’, ITC Avant Garde Gothic and or Futura for the rest.

If you only need the logo, you can find it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905052623/http:/brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=865844&page=1&mtype=&brand_id=122840).

You can get the .eps of it here:

[http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=1&text=Sanofi+Pasteur](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905052623/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=1&text=Sanofi+Pasteur "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=1&text=Sanofi+Pasteur")
Is there an echo in here? :^D
